content:
I'm looking to try and enable logging for Library/Core but the RUSTC_LOG looks to only enable binaries within RUSTC and the trace! macro isn't available in Library/Core.

How would I do this?
why do you want to emit logging?
i'm getting wrong hash values trying to implement a new hasher, so i'm trying to trace my errors within my algo
ah. I'd recommend just printing unconditionally and then removing it once you find the bug.
ah, so just deconstruct my fn within the ./core/test and println that way?
oof this being in core makes it harder
if it's in a test println! will work but not in core itself
yea, i know, i decided to tackle something that might involve some creative thinking
